members.description: The exponent used in the easing calculation. The higher the value of the exponent property, the greater the acceleration and deceleration. For example, to get quadratic behavior, set exponent to 2. To get cubic behavior, set exponent to 3.
Constructor.  in the acceleration phase, between 0.0 and 1.0.

values: easeInFraction The fraction of the overall duration
exponent The exponent used in the easing calculation.
